verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to Ariel, <WH740> to Ariel, <WH740> the city <WH7151> where David <WH1732> dwelt! <WH2583> add <WH5595> ye year <WH8141> to <WH5921> year; <WH8141> let them kill <WH5362> sacrifices. <WH2282>
Yet I will distress <WH6693> Ariel, <WH740> and there shall be <WH1961> heaviness <WH8386> and sorrow: <WH592> and it shall be <WH1961> unto me as Ariel. <WH740>

And I will camp <WH2583> against <WH5921> thee round about, <WH1754> and will lay siege <WH6696> against <WH5921> thee with a mount, <WH4674> and I will raise <WH6965> forts <WH4694> against <WH5921> thee.

And thou shalt be brought down, <WH8213> and shalt speak <WH1696> out of the ground, <WH4480> <WH776> and thy speech <WH565> shall be low <WH7817> out of the dust, <WH4480> <WH6083> and thy voice <WH6963> shall be, <WH1961> as of one that hath a familiar spirit, <WH178> out of the ground, <WH4480> <WH776> and thy speech <WH565> shall whisper <WH6850> out of the dust. <WH4480> <WH6083>

Moreover the multitude <WH1995> of thy strangers <WH2114> shall be <WH1961> like small <WH1851> dust, <WH80> and the multitude <WH1995> of the terrible ones <WH6184> shall be as chaff <WH4671> that passeth away: <WH5674> yea, it shall be <WH1961> at an instant <WH6621> suddenly. <WH6597>

Thou shalt be visited <WH6485> of <WH4480> <WH5973> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> with thunder, <WH7482> and with earthquake, <WH7494> and great <WH1419> noise, <WH6963> with storm <WH5492> and tempest, <WH5591> and the flame <WH3851> of devouring <WH398> fire. <WH784>

And the multitude <WH1995> of all <WH3605> the nations <WH1471> that fight <WH6633> against <WH5921> Ariel, <WH740> even all <WH3605> that fight <WH6633> against her and her munition, <WH4685> and that distress <WH6693> her, shall be <WH1961> as a dream <WH2472> of a night <WH3915> vision. <WH2377>

It shall even be <WH1961> as when <WH834> a hungry <WH7457> man dreameth, <WH2492> and, behold, <WH2009> he eateth; <WH398> but he awaketh, <WH6974> and his soul <WH5315> is empty: <WH7386> or as when <WH834> a thirsty man <WH6771> dreameth, <WH2492> and, behold, <WH2009> he drinketh; <WH8354> but he awaketh, <WH6974> and, behold, <WH2009> he is faint, <WH5889> and his soul <WH5315> hath appetite: <WH8264> so <WH3651> shall the multitude <WH1995> of all <WH3605> the nations <WH1471> be, <WH1961> that fight <WH6633> against <WH5921> mount <WH2022> Zion. <WH6726>

Stay yourselves, <WH4102> and wonder; <WH8539> cry ye out, <WH8173> and cry: <WH8173> they are drunken, <WH7937> but not <WH3808> with wine; <WH3196> they stagger, <WH5128> but not <WH3808> with strong drink. <WH7941>

For <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath poured out <WH5258> upon <WH5921> you the spirit <WH7307> of deep sleep, <WH8639> and hath closed <WH6105> <WH853> your eyes: <WH5869> <WH853> the prophets <WH5030> and your rulers, <WH7218> the seers <WH2374> hath he covered. <WH3680>

And the vision <WH2380> of all <WH3605> is become <WH1961> unto you as the words <WH1697> of a book <WH5612> that is sealed, <WH2856> which <WH834> men deliver <WH5414> to <WH413> one that is learned, <WH3045> <WH5612> saying, <WH559> Read <WH7121> this, <WH2088> I pray thee: <WH4994> and he saith, <WH559> I cannot; <WH3201> <WH3808> for <WH3588> it <WH1931> is sealed: <WH2856>

And the book <WH5612> is delivered <WH5414> to <WH5921> him that <WH834> is not learned, <WH3045> <WH3808> <WH5612> saying, <WH559> Read <WH7121> this, <WH2088> I pray thee: <WH4994> and he saith, <WH559> I am not learned. <WH3045> <WH3808> <WH5612>

Wherefore the Lord <WH136> said, <WH559> Forasmuch <WH3282> <WH3588> as this <WH2088> people <WH5971> draw near <WH5066> me with their mouth, <WH6310> and with their lips <WH8193> do honor <WH3513> me, but have removed their heart far <WH7368> <WH3820> from <WH4480> me, and their fear <WH3374> toward <WH854> me is <WH1961> taught <WH3925> by the precept <WH4687> of men: <WH376>

Therefore, <WH3651> behold, <WH2009> I will proceed <WH3254> to do a marvelous work <WH6381> among <WH854> this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> even a marvelous work <WH6381> and a wonder: <WH6382> for the wisdom <WH2451> of their wise <WH2450> men shall perish, <WH6> and the understanding <WH998> of their prudent <WH995> men shall be hid. <WH5641>

Woe <WH1945> unto them that seek deep <WH6009> to hide <WH5641> their counsel <WH6098> from the LORD, <WH4480> <WH3068> and their works <WH4639> are <WH1961> in the dark, <WH4285> and they say, <WH559> Who <WH4310> seeth <WH7200> us? and who <WH4310> knoweth <WH3045> us?

Surely <WH518> your turning of things upside down <WH2017> shall be esteemed <WH2803> as the potter's <WH3335> clay: <WH2563> for <WH3588> shall the work <WH4639> say <WH559> of him that made <WH6213> it, He made <WH6213> me not? <WH3808> or shall the thing framed <WH3336> say <WH559> of him that framed <WH3335> it, He had no understanding? <WH995> <WH3808>

Is it not <WH3808> yet <WH5750> a very <WH4213> little while, <WH4592> and Lebanon <WH3844> shall be turned <WH7725> into a fruitful field, <WH3759> and the fruitful field <WH3759> shall be esteemed <WH2803> as a forest? <WH3293>

And in that <WH1931> day <WH3117> shall the deaf <WH2795> hear <WH8085> the words <WH1697> of the book, <WH5612> and the eyes <WH5869> of the blind <WH5787> shall see <WH7200> out of obscurity, <WH4480> <WH652> and out of darkness. <WH4480> <WH2822>
The meek <WH6035> also shall increase <WH3254> their joy <WH8057> in the LORD, <WH3068> and the poor <WH34> among men <WH120> shall rejoice <WH1523> in the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel. <WH3478>
For <WH3588> the terrible one <WH6184> is brought to naught, <WH656> and the scorner <WH3887> is consumed, <WH3615> and all <WH3605> that watch <WH8245> for iniquity <WH205> are cut off: <WH3772>

That make a man an offender <WH2398> <WH120> for a word, <WH1697> and lay a snare <WH6983> for him that reproveth <WH3198> in the gate, <WH8179> and turn aside <WH5186> the just <WH6662> for a thing of naught. <WH8414>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> who <WH834> redeemed <WH6299> <WH853> Abraham, <WH85> concerning <WH413> the house <WH1004> of Jacob, <WH3290> Jacob <WH3290> shall not <WH3808> now <WH6258> be ashamed, <WH954> neither <WH3808> shall his face <WH6440> now <WH6258> wax pale. <WH2357>

But when <WH3588> he seeth <WH7200> his children, <WH3206> the work <WH4639> of mine hands, <WH3027> in the midst <WH7130> of him, they shall sanctify <WH6942> my name, <WH8034> and sanctify <WH6942> <WH853> the Holy One <WH6918> of Jacob, <WH3290> and shall fear <WH6206> the God <WH430> of Israel. <WH3478>
They also that erred <WH8582> in spirit <WH7307> shall come <WH3045> to understanding, <WH998> and they that murmured <WH7279> shall learn <WH3925> doctrine. <WH3948>
